title.value: Application of Artificial Intelligence in Shared Decision Making: Scoping Review
title.justification: The title is explicitly mentioned in the metadata and throughout the document.
title.quote: Application of Artificial Intelligence in Shared Decision Making: Scoping Review

extractions.description: This paper presents a scoping review that examines the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Shared Decision Making (SDM) in healthcare settings. It details the types of AI technologies deployed, their roles in decision-making processes, and the involvement of end-users in the design and validation stages. The review also emphasizes the need for better explainability of AI tools to foster trust and effective integration into clinical practice.

type.justification: The paper conducts a scoping review where it systematically collects, evaluates, and presents data from existing studies on the use of AI in SDM, reflecting empirical research methodologies.
type.quote: We performed a scoping review informed by the methodological framework proposed by Levac et al...

name.justification: The paper focuses on the use of AI in healthcare settings, specifically in the context of shared decision making, aligning with the Medical Informatics field.
name.quote: Artificial intelligence (AI) has shown promising results in various fields of medicine... to facilitate shared decision making (SDM).

name.justification: The paper extensively discusses the application of AI technologies in healthcare decision-making processes, indicating its relevance to the field of AI.
name.quote: Artificial intelligence (AI), defined as “computational intelligence”... describes the fast-growing field of simulating intelligent, human-like behavior...

name.justification: Shared Decision Making is the specific context in which AI is being applied in this study, with a focus on collaborations between patients and healthcare providers.
name.quote: We aimed to identify and evaluate published studies that have tested or implemented AI to facilitate SDM.

name.justification: The paper mentions the use of artificial neural networks as one of the methods in a decision support system for neonatal care.
name.quote: Frize et al [41] developed and tested a decision support system that used AI... such as artificial neural networks...

is_contributed.justification: The paper does not introduce or claim a novel contribution in artificial neural networks but reviews its application in existing studies.
is_contributed.quote: Frize et al [41] developed and tested a decision support system that used AI to tailor information...

is_executed.justification: The execution details, such as running on CPU or GPU, are not mentioned in the paper.
is_executed.quote: The AI component was capable of knowledge learning, processing, and derivation.

is_compared.justification: The paper does not compare artificial neural networks numerically to other models.
is_compared.quote: No explicit comparison with other AI models is discussed in terms of performance or outcomes.
